alert.note: Alert for Coastal Charlotte; Coastal Lee; Inland Charlotte; Inland Lee (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 25 at 3:21PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Charlotte and northeastern Lee Counties through 345 PM EDT... At 320 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Olga, or 14 miles north of Lehigh Acres, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Cape Coral, Fort Myers, Lehigh Acres, Babcock Ranch, Southwest Florida Airport, North Fort Myers, Page Field Airport, and Alva. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Charlotte; Coastal Lee; Inland Charlotte; Inland Lee
